works.description: During the Salone del Mobile in Milan this year, design-oriented office furniture manufacturer Nurus presented the Lodge, an innovative seating, working, socializing and relaxation unit for office employees. Designed by Oguz Yalim and Ece Selamoglu Yalim, the Lodge represents an alternative to the conventional workstation, and offers a casual place to relax and meet colleagues. The Lodge can also be used in a reception area as lounge seating for visitors.
